description: Converts the Galaxy Tab / Note 30pin plug to a standard micro USB plug, allowing you to use any micro USB cable to charge any Galaxy Tab or Note which uses this shape connector. Suitable for charging only, not data transfer.Please see the picture at the top of this page of the adaptor in use - the normal USB cable will not allow charging from most USB sockets, this adaptor used with any micro USB cable will.Has been tested with iPhone/iPad chargers, Samsung micro USB chargers, and the entire range of PortaPow car/mains/solar chargers.This adaptor allows you to use the PortaPow high speed micro USB cable, this uses 24AWG wire with lower resistance than the original Samsung USB cable, allowing 10-20% faster charging from the original 2 Amp Galaxy Tab Charger or another 2 Amp charger such as the PortaPow Dual or Quad.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab / Note to Micro USB High Speed Charger Converter / Connector / Adapter
